com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Am3sControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Am3sControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl, UpDeviceControl

    public class Am3sControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl, UpDeviceControl
    Public API for the AM3S

    The class provides methods to control AM3S device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a AM3S device, you need to calliHealthDevicesManager#discoveryiHealthDevice to discovery a new AM3S device, and then calliHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect AM3S device.
